newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: SM Prime buys more land for 256 mln pesos.
newsitem.headline: SM Prime buys more land for 256 mln pesos.

text.p: SM Prime Holdings Inc said on Tuesday its board approved the purchase of about 131,000 sq metres of land in various parts of the country for a total of 256 million pesos.

In a statement, SM Prime said it bought 10,933 sq metres of land in Meycauayan in Bulacan north of Manila, 89,562 sq metres in Santa Rosa in Laguna south of the capital and 30,301 sq metres in the central Philippine city of Iloilo.
SM Prime is the owner and developer of the largest chain of shopping malls in the country.
